I think it was very unhelpful following
9/11 because I think they uh stepped
away uh from their traditional role of
oversight uh any executive branch in my
view which doesn't have a strong
oversight from Congress and the strong
checking of our Free Press will go off
the tracks anyone de Democrat Republican

tension and uh I would say that members
of the press were primarily
AWOL uh for a couple of years they've
come back now now an Administration or
any Administration which depends on the
press for spinning to get their message
out should not then be upset if the
Press doesn't entirely buy the spin or
is somewhat critical of you and I think
there's a lot of times been uh damning
the press and denting the Press uh when
they're actually just doing their own
job in other words you can't depend on
them uh to be spun and then be angry
with them when they're uh you know when
they're being somewhat critical you
can't have it both ways
